Pradeep Kr. Jha

Professor at IIT Roorkee

About

Pradeep Kr. Jha is a distinguished Professor renowned for his exceptional contributions to the field of mechanical engineering. With expertise spanning Metal Casting, Modeling, Simulation, Aluminium-based Metal Matrix Composites, and CFD-based Modeling of Steelmaking Processes, he stands as a pillar of knowledge and innovation. His academic journey is marked by a B.Sc. in Mechanical Engineering, M.Tech. in Foundry & Forge Technology, and a Ph.D. in Mechanical Engineering (Process modeling). Professor Jha's relentless pursuit of excellence has significantly enriched the realms of mechanical engineering, making him a respected figure in the academic community.

Research Interest

Metal Casting, Modeling and Simulation, Aluminium based Metal Matrix Composites, CFD based Modeling of Steelmaking Processes in Continuous Casting (Physical & Mathematical Modeling)
